This is jg.spectdelay~, a granulation object for Max5.

Copy "jg.spectdelay~.mxo" into the "Max5/Cycling '74/msp-externals" folder.
Copy the "jg.spectdelay-help" folder into the "Max5/Cycling '74/msp-help" folder.

(This object also works in Max/MSP 4.6. Contact me if you want a
4.6-compatible version of "jg.spectdelay~.maxhelp".)

GPL-licensed source code is available from http://john-gibson.com/software.htm.

Changes:

v0.9	- fixed cause of some crashes when running on Snow Leopard


John Gibson <johgibso@gmail.com>
www.john-gibson.com
